'''Zamar''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The head of the shipyard in Queen's Berth, Zamar is the go-to dwarf when you need your ship fixed. Of course, sometimes clients renege on the agreements, leaving him with a pile of bills and nothing to pay them with. He's also old - very old - and has trouble keeping up with the work. 

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Ships and ship supplies
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  = [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/)
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* [Dwarves](/dwarf/) have unique dialogue with Zamar when first talking to him: ''"Glad to see a client eye to eye for a change."''
* Completing [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/) gives a 10% discount on goods at the shipyard.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/): He asks you to settle a debt in return for a pay cut or selling the debtor's commission.

## Behind the scenes

* It was once possible to repair [The Defiant](/theDefiant/) in dialogue with Zamar for {{cp2|10000}} (unrelated to [Repair Supplies](/repairSupplies/)), giving you the ability to sail in "deeper waters". This mechanic seems to have been cut and replaced with the [Stranded](/stranded/) quest arc on [Maje Island](/majeIsland/).
